projects.name: Filmein
projects.description: Movie recommendation web application based on a Facebook profile's likes and ratings.

projects.name: GeoPoverty
projects.description: Location-based web application to display U.S. Census poverty data based on zip code.

projects.name: The Human Song
projects.description: Simple Java program to play C chords based on permutations in transcription sequences in DNA.

projects.name: Upkeep
projects.description: Android SMS client with real-time emotional sentiment analysis of text conversations.

projects.description: A music visualizer built from scratch with a Raspberry Pi, an Arduino UNO, WS2812 LEDs, and a breadboard.

projects.name: Red Cross / Smoke Alarm Portal
projects.description: Open-source Express web application for the Red Cross to manage national fire alarm installations.
